name: Creditor's Report
query:
SELECT 	pi.name AS "Invoice No:Link/Purchase Invoice:150", 
		pi.supplier AS "Customer:Link/Supplier:150", 
		GROUP_CONCAT(pid.item_name) AS "Items:Data:200",
		pi.due_date AS "Due Date:Date:100", 
		ROUND(IF(pi.currency = "INR", IF( pi.currency = pi.party_account_currency, pi.outstanding_amount, pi.outstanding_amount/pi.conversion_rate), 0),2) AS "INR:Float:100",
		pi._user_tags as "Remarks:Data:200"
FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` as pid ON pi.name = pid.parent
WHERE pi.status IN ("Submitted", "Unpaid", "Overdue")
GROUP BY pi.name
